translation.Olá, eu me chamo João Paulo, tenho 22 an: Hello, my name is João Paulo, I'm 22 years old and I live in Brazil, I'm currently studying Computer Science at EEP (Escola de Engenharia de Piracicaba), I started in 2018 and I'm finishing in 2022.
translation.Atualmente não estou empregado, mas pret: I'm not currently employed, but i intend to work in an area focused on web development, specifically in Front-end using ReactJS and NextJS.
